name: One Hand Samurai
description:
One Hand Samurai

One hit to kill. 
One minute to live. 
One bad guy to slay. 
One button to press.

Description

Evil master took your hand, bring it back or you will die from bleeding. 
Kill his minions to restore health.

Controls

WASD - move
Left mouse button - dash & attack

Team
